mapper.insert: insert into carpool(carno, category, mno, usertype, departure, arrival, seat, memo) values(car_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{mno}, #{usertype}, #{departure}, #{arrival}, #{seat}, #{memo})
mapper.select: select C.*, M.* from carpool C, member M where C.mno = M.mno and category=#{category} order by carno desc
